alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 12 at 9:55PM CDT until September 13 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...High wave action and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. Waves 3 to 5 ft expected. * WHERE...In Illinois, Lake, Northern Cook, and Central Cook Counties. In Indiana, Lake and Porter Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
